Commands.Astral Fire: Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack  Self: 3 turns Astral Fire; cancels Umbral Ice
Commands.Umbral Ice: Ice magic BRV attack + HP attack  Self: 3 turns Umbral Ice; cancels Astral Fire

Passives.Astral Fire Charge: Increases the max uses of Astral Fire by 1.
Passives.Astral Fire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Astral Fire.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Umbral Ice Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Umbral Ice.
Passives.Umbral Ice Charge: Increases the max uses of Umbral Ice by 1.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Initial Buff Speed: Moderately raises INT BRV, slightly raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Astral Fire Extension: Astral Fire use +1When using Astral Fire:   Becomes 2-hit BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage   Slight Astral Fire status effect boostWhile Astral Fire active:   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Fire) (powerful Fire magic BRV attack)   HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Fire) (Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack)
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Largely raises MAX BRV, moderately raises ATK with active buffs
Passives.Umbral Ice Extension: When using Umbral Ice:   BRV hit count increased to 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage   Moderate Umbral Ice status effect boostWhile Umbral Ice active:   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ice) (high turn rate; Ice magic BRV attack)   HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Ice) (increased BRV based on ATK + HP attack)While Astral Fire active:   Umbral Ice becomes Umbral Ice+ (grants 8 turns MAG ATK Up I to self)

Weapons.Anathema CP: 15: Increases Astral Fire's potency and extends its duration.
Weapons.Stardust Rod CP: 35: Increases Umbral Ice's potency and extends its duration.
